title: 有关训练时候的多线程问题RuntimeError: DataLoader worker (pid 899) exited unexpectedly with exit code 1. Details are lost due to multiprocessing. Rerunning with num_workers=0 may give better error trace.
body:
作者您好！请问以下错位如何解决，我用的是Pytorch1.0.0，是否需要使用Pytorch0.4.0才能跑通？
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "crnn_main.py", line 189, in <module>
    training()
  File "crnn_main.py", line 107, in training
    cost = trainBatch(crnn, criterion, optimizer, train_iter)
  File "crnn_main.py", line 84, in trainBatch
    data = train_iter.next()
  File "/home/cv_user/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 631, in __next__
    idx, batch = self._get_batch()
  File "/home/cv_user/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 610, in _get_batch
    return self.data_queue.get()
  File "/home/cv_user/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/queues.py", line 94, in get
    res = self._recv_bytes()
  File "/home/cv_user/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/connection.py", line 216, in recv_bytes
    buf = self._recv_bytes(maxlength)
  File "/home/cv_user/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/connection.py", line 407, in _recv_bytes
    buf = self._recv(4)
  File "/home/cv_user/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/connection.py", line 379, in _recv
    chunk = read(handle, remaining)
  File "/home/cv_user/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 274, in handler
    _error_if_any_worker_fails()
RuntimeError: DataLoader worker (pid 899) exited unexpectedly with exit code 1. Details are lost due to multiprocessing. Rerunning with num_workers=0 may give better error trace.
